objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Mystery/Detective lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about travel and tourism using expert register
Students create original mystery themed content about travel and tourism in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using expert register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in expert register within mystery theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
